resources.string: Given to player who has largest army
Given to player with the longest road
Awarded when a player single-handedly defends against Barbarians.
Given to the player who controls the Merchant.
When this prgress card is picked it is emmediately played and cannot be taken.
When this progress card is picked it is emmediately played and cannot be taken.
Given to last player who has placed the Merchant
Player who has most harbor points gets this card
Counts against your points so you need 1 extra point to win
Given to player with most gold coins
Given to player with fewest gold coins
One given for each discovered island
One of users roads is damaged
Given for each pirate fortress conquered
Given to player who has discovered most territories
Current player places the robber and all players discard half of your cards (round down). Same as rolling a '7'
Each player recieves 1 resource for a city (no commodity)
Each player has one of their roads damaged
Each player give the player to their left 1 resource or commodity of the givers choice
The player(s) with most (active) knights take 1 resource card
The single player with longest road can take 1 resource card from another player
Player with the most harbors can take 1 resource card of their choice

Neighborly\nAssistance Player with most victory points gives a player of their choice a resource card of the givers choice if they have it. Conflict The single player with largest army (active knights) take a random resource or commodity card form another player Plentiful\nYear Each player takes 1 resource of their choice from supply No Event The settlers labor and Catan prospers.
// Take all of one resource Monopoly force other players to give you resources of your choice YearOfPlenty Draw resources of your choice from pile Road Building Build 2 roads for free Victory Can be applied to your total points when the result winds you the game Soldier Use to place the robber Warship Convert a ship into a warship
Science Abbey Library Aqueduct Theatre University
Trade Market Trading House Merchant Guild Bank Bazaar
Politics Town Hall Church Fortress Cathedral Castle
Paper Can be exchanged for Science improvements Cloth Can be exchanged for Trade improvements Coin Can be exchanged for Politics improvements
Road Ship Warship Development Settlement City City Wall Knight Promote Knight Activate Knight
Knight Hood Place 1 knight on one of the unoccupied paths of the castle tile. Black Knight Place a knight on an open path of your choice. Intregue Remove a barbarian form a hex of your choice and add to your prisoners. If there are no more barbarians, then draw a new card. Treason Obtain 2 Gold and remove 2 barbarians from 2 different tiles (or from supply) and place on 2 other unconquered tiles.
